isis.stitle: TSI 92-08-01 - Incorrect Reading by Kysor Temperature Switches

subjectgroup.subject: Incorrect Reading by Kysor Temperature Switches

geninfo.para: In order to assure proper operation of Kysor temperature switches with reducer bushings, the correct bushing must be used. A 1/2 inch to 3/8 inch pipe thread flush bushing is available under part number 1617277C1. At least 3/4 inch of the end of the switch must extend into the coolant. Use of a standard pipe bushing prevents full penetration of the switch into the coolant ( Figure 1).
